verses.verse: וְלִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> Now the sons יִשָׂשכָ֗ר <WH3485> of Issachar תּוֹלָ֧ע <WH8439> [were] Tola וּפוּאָ֛ה <WH6312> and Puah [יָשִׁיב כ] (יָשׁ֥וּב <WH3437> Jashub ק) וְשִׁמְר֖וֹן <WH8110> and Shimron אַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <WH702> four ס

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the sons תוֹלָ֗ע <WH8439> of Tola עֻזִּ֡י <WH5813> Uzzi וּרְפָיָ֡ה <WH7509> and Rephaiah וִֽ֠ירִיאֵל <WH3400> and Jeriel וְיַחְמַ֨י <WH3181> and Jahmai וְיִבְשָׂ֜ם <WH3005> and Jibsam וּשְׁמוּאֵ֗ל <WH8050> and Shemuel רָאשִׁ֤ים <WH7218> heads לְבֵית־ <WH1004> house אֲבוֹתָם֙ <WH1> of their father's לְתוֹלָ֔ע <WH8439> [to wit] of Tola גִּבּ֥וֹרֵי <WH1368> [they were] valiant men חַ֖יִל <WH2428> of might לְתֹלְדוֹתָ֑ם <WH8435> in their generations מִסְפָּרָם֙ <WH4557> whose number בִּימֵ֣י <WH3117> [was] in the days דָוִ֔יד <WH1732> of David עֶשְׂרִֽים־ <WH6242> and twenty וּשְׁנַ֥יִם <WH8147> two אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> and six מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> hundred ס

וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> And the sons עֻזִּ֖י <WH5813> of Uzzi יִֽזְרַֽחְיָ֑ה <WH3156> Izrahiah וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> and the sons יִֽזְרַֽחְיָ֗ה <WH3156> of Izrahiah מִֽיכָאֵ֡ל <WH4317> Michael וְ֠עֹבַדְיָה <WH5662> and Obadiah וְיוֹאֵ֧ל <WH3100> and Joel יִשִּׁיָּ֛ה <WH3449> Ishiah חֲמִשָּׁ֖ה <WH2568> five רָאשִׁ֥ים <WH7218> all of them chief men כֻּלָּֽם׃ <WH3605> all

וַעֲלֵיהֶ֨ם <WH5921> by לְתֹלְדוֹתָ֜ם <WH8435> And with them by their generations לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> after the house אֲבוֹתָ֗ם <WH1> of their fathers גְּדוּדֵי֙ <WH1416> [were] bands צְבָ֣א <WH6635> of soldiers מִלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> for war שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> and thirty וְשִׁשָּׁ֖ה <WH8337> six אָ֑לֶף <WH505> thousand כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הִרְבּ֥וּ <WH7235> [men] for they had many נָשִׁ֖ים <WH802> wives וּבָנִֽים׃ <WH1121> and sons

וַאֲחֵיהֶ֗ם <WH251> And their brethren לְכֹל֙ <WH3605> all מִשְׁפְּח֣וֹת <WH4940> among all the families יִשָׂשכָ֔ר <WH3485> of Issachar גִּבּוֹרֵ֖י <WH1368> [were] valiant חֲיָלִ֑ים <WH2428> men of might שְׁמוֹנִ֤ים <WH8084> fourscore וְשִׁבְעָה֙ <WH7651> and seven אֶ֔לֶף <WH505> thousand הִתְיַחְשָׂ֖ם <WH3187> reckoned in all by their genealogies לַכֹּֽל׃ <WH3605> all manner פ
בִּנְיָמִ֗ן <WH1144> [The sons] of Benjamin בֶּ֧לַע <WH1106> Bela וָבֶ֛כֶר <WH1071> and Becher וִידִֽיעֲאֵ֖ל <WH3043> and Jediael שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> three

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the sons בֶ֗לַע <WH1106> of Bela אֶצְבּ֡וֹן <WH675> Ezbon וְעֻזִּ֡י <WH5813> and Uzzi וְ֠עֻזִּיאֵל <WH5816> and Uzziel וִירִימ֨וֹת <WH3406> and Jerimoth וְעִירִ֜י <WH5901> and Iri חֲמִשָּׁ֗ה <WH2568> five רָאשֵׁי֙ <WH7218> heads בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house אָב֔וֹת <WH1> of [their] fathers גִּבּוֹרֵ֖י <WH1368> mighty חֲיָלִ֑ים <WH2428> men of valour וְהִתְיַחְשָׂ֗ם <WH3187> and were reckoned by their genealogies עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> twenty וּשְׁנַ֙יִם֙ <WH8147> and two אֶ֔לֶף <WH505> thousand וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֖ים <WH7970> and thirty וְאַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <WH702> and four ס

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the sons בֶ֗כֶר <WH1071> of Becher זְמִירָ֡ה <WH2160> Zemira וְיוֹעָ֡שׁ <WH3135> and Joash וֶ֠אֱלִיעֶזֶר <WH461> and Eliezer וְאֶלְיוֹעֵינַ֤י <WH454> and Elioenai וְעָמְרִי֙ <WH6018> and Omri וִירֵמ֣וֹת <WH3406> and Jerimoth וַאֲבִיָּ֔ה <WH29> and Abiah וַעֲנָת֖וֹת <WH6068> and Anathoth וְעָלָ֑מֶת <WH5964> and Alameth כָּל־ <WH3605> All אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> All these [are] the sons בָֽכֶר׃ <WH1071> of Becher

וְהִתְיַחְשָׂ֣ם <WH3187> And the number לְתֹלְדוֹתָ֗ם <WH8435> of them after their genealogy by their generations רָאשֵׁי֙ <WH7218> heads בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house אֲבוֹתָ֔ם <WH1> of their fathers גִּבּוֹרֵ֖י <WH1368> mighty men חָ֑יִל <WH2428> of valour עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> [was] twenty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand וּמָאתָֽיִם׃ <WH3967> and two hundred ס

וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> The sons יְדִיעֲאֵ֖ל <WH3043> also of Jediael בִּלְהָ֑ן <WH1092> Bilhan וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> and the sons בִלְהָ֗ן <WH1092> of Bilhan [יְעִישׁ כ] (יְע֡וּשׁ <WH3266> Jehush ק) וּ֠בִנְיָמִן <WH1144> and Benjamin וְאֵה֤וּד <WH164> and Ehud וּֽכְנַעֲנָה֙ <WH3668> and Chenaanah וְזֵיתָ֔ן <WH2133> and Zethan וְתַרְשִׁ֖ישׁ <WH8659> and Tharshish וַאֲחִישָֽׁחַר׃ <WH300> and Ahishahar

כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner אֵ֜לֶּה <WH428> these בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> All these the sons יְדִֽיעֲאֵל֙ <WH3043> of Jediael לְרָאשֵׁ֣י <WH7218> by the heads הָאָב֔וֹת <WH1> of their fathers גִּבּוֹרֵ֖י <WH1368> mighty חֲיָלִ֑ים <WH2428> men of valour שִׁבְעָֽה־ <WH7651> seven עָשָׂ֥ר <WH6240> teen אֶ֙לֶף֙ <WH505> thousand וּמָאתַ֔יִם <WH3967> and two hundred יֹצְאֵ֥י <WH3318> [soldiers] fit to go out צָבָ֖א <WH6635> for war לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> [and] battle
וְשֻׁפִּ֤ם <WH8206> Shuppim וְחֻפִּם֙ <WH2650> also and Huppim בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children עִ֔יר <WH5893> of Ir חֻשִׁ֖ם <WH2366> [and] Hushim בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the sons אַחֵֽר׃ <WH313> of Aher

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The sons נַפְתָּלִ֗י <WH5321> of Naphtali יַחֲצִיאֵ֧ל <WH3185> Jahziel וְגוּנִ֛י <WH1476> and Guni וְיֵ֥צֶר <WH3337> and Jezer וְשַׁלּ֖וּם <WH7967> and Shallum בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the sons בִלְהָֽה׃ <WH1090> of Bilhah פ

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The sons מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <WH4519> of Manasseh אַשְׂרִיאֵ֖ל <WH844> Ashriel אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom יָלָ֑דָה <WH3205> whom she bare פִּֽילַגְשׁוֹ֙ <WH6370> ([but] his concubine הָֽאֲרַמִּיָּ֔ה <WH761> the Aramitess יָלְדָ֕ה <WH3205> bare אֶת־ <WH853> מָכִ֖יר <WH4353> Machir אֲבִ֥י <WH1> the father גִלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> of Gilead

וּמָכִ֞יר <WH4353> And Machir לָקַ֤ח <WH3947> took אִשָּׁה֙ <WH802> to wife לְחֻפִּ֣ים <WH2650> [the sister] of Huppim וּלְשֻׁפִּ֔ים <WH8206> and Shuppim וְשֵׁ֤ם <WH8034> name אֲחֹתוֹ֙ <WH269> whose sister's מַעֲכָ֔ה <WH4601> was Maacah וְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> and the name הַשֵּׁנִ֖י <WH8145> of the second צְלָפְחָ֑ד <WH6765> [was] Zelophehad וַתִּהְיֶ֥נָה <WH1961> had לִצְלָפְחָ֖ד <WH6765> and Zelophehad בָּנֽוֹת׃ <WH1323> had daughters

וַתֵּ֨לֶד <WH3205> bare מַעֲכָ֤ה <WH4601> And Maachah אֵֽשֶׁת־ <WH802> the wife מָכִיר֙ <WH4353> of Machir בֵּ֔ן <WH1121> a son וַתִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> and she called שְׁמוֹ֙ <WH8034> his name פֶּ֔רֶשׁ <WH6570> Peresh וְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> and the name אָחִ֖יו <WH251> of his brother שָׁ֑רֶשׁ <WH8329> [was] Sheresh וּבָנָ֖יו <WH1121> and his sons אוּלָ֥ם <WH198> [were] Ulam וָרָֽקֶם׃ <WH7552> and Rakem

וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> And the sons אוּלָ֖ם <WH198> of Ulam בְּדָ֑ן <WH917> Bedan אֵ֚לֶּה <WH428> These בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> These [were] the sons גִלְעָ֔ד <WH1568> of Gilead בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מָכִ֖יר <WH4353> of Machir בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <WH4519> of Manasseh

וַאֲחֹת֖וֹ <WH269> And his sister הַמֹּלֶ֑כֶת <WH4447> Hammoleketh יָלְדָה֙ <WH3205> bare אֶת־ <WH853> אִישְׁה֔וֹד <WH379> Ishod וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֲבִיעֶ֖זֶר <WH44> and Abiezer וְאֶת־ <WH853> מַחְלָֽה׃ <WH4244> and Mahalah

וַיִּהְי֖וּ <WH1961> become בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the sons שְׁמִידָ֑ע <WH8061> of Shemida אַחְיָ֣ן <WH291> were Ahian וָשֶׁ֔כֶם <WH7928> and Shechem וְלִקְחִ֖י <WH3949> and Likhi וַאֲנִיעָֽם׃ <WH593> and Aniam פ

וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> And the sons אֶפְרַ֖יִם <WH669> of Ephraim שׁוּתָ֑לַח <WH7803> Shuthelah וּבֶ֤רֶד <WH1260> and Bered בְּנוֹ֙ <WH1121> his son וְתַ֣חַת <WH8480> and Tahath בְּנ֔וֹ <WH1121> his son וְאֶלְעָדָ֥ה <WH497> and Eladah בְנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son וְתַ֥חַת <WH8480> and Tahath בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> his son

וְזָבָ֥ד <WH2066> And Zabad בְּנ֛וֹ <WH1121> his son וְשׁוּתֶ֥לַח <WH7803> and Shuthelah בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son וְעֵ֣זֶר <WH5827> and Ezer וְאֶלְעָ֑ד <WH496> and Elead וַהֲרָג֗וּם <WH2026> slew אַנְשֵׁי־ <WH582> whom the men גַת֙ <WH1661> of Gath הַנּוֹלָדִ֣ים <WH3205> [that were] born בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> in [that] land כִּ֣י <WH3588> because יָרְד֔וּ <WH3381> because they came down לָקַ֖חַת <WH3947> to take away אֶת־ <WH853> מִקְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4735> their cattle

וַיִּתְאַבֵּ֛ל <WH56> mourned אֶפְרַ֥יִם <WH669> And Ephraim אֲבִיהֶ֖ם <WH1> their father יָמִ֣ים <WH3117> days רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> many וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <WH935> came אֶחָ֖יו <WH251> and his brethren לְנַחֲמֽוֹ׃ <WH5162> to comfort

וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> And when he went in אֶל־ <WH413> to אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <WH802> to his wife וַתַּ֖הַר <WH2029> she conceived וַתֵּ֣לֶד <WH3205> and bare בֵּ֑ן <WH1121> a son וַיִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> and he called אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמוֹ֙ <WH8034> his name בְּרִיעָ֔ה <WH1283> Beriah כִּ֥י <WH3588> because בְרָעָ֖ה <WH7451> because it went evil הָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> had come בְּבֵיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1004> with his house

וּבִתּ֣וֹ <WH1323> (And his daughter שֶׁאֱרָ֔ה <WH7609> [was] Sherah וַתִּ֧בֶן <WH1129> who built אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּית־ חוֹר֛וֹן <WH1032> Bethhoron הַתַּחְתּ֖וֹן <WH8481> the nether וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָעֶלְי֑וֹן <WH5945> and the upper וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> אֻזֵּ֥ן שֶׁאֱרָֽה׃ <WH242> Uzzen-sheerah
וְרֶ֣פַח <WH7506> And Rephah בְּנ֗וֹ <WH1121> [was] his son וְרֶ֧שֶׁף <WH7566> also Resheph וְתֶ֛לַח <WH8520> and Telah בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son וְתַ֥חַן <WH8465> and Tahan בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> his son
לַעְדָּ֥ן <WH3936> Laadan בְּנ֛וֹ <WH1121> his son עַמִּיה֥וּד <WH5989> Ammihud בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son אֱלִישָׁמָ֥ע <WH476> Elishama בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> his son
נ֥וֹן <WH5126> Non בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son יְהוֹשֻׁ֥עַ <WH3091> Jehoshua בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> his son

וַאֲחֻזָּתָם֙ <WH272> And their possessions וּמֹ֣שְׁבוֹתָ֔ם <WH4186> and habitations בֵּֽית־ אֵ֖ל <WH1008> [were] Bethel וּבְנֹתֶ֑יהָ <WH1323> and the towns וְלַמִּזְרָ֣ח <WH4217> thereof and eastward נַעֲרָ֔ן <WH5295> Naaran וְלַֽמַּעֲרָ֗ב <WH4628> and westward גֶּ֤זֶר <WH1507> Gezer וּבְנֹתֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH1323> with the towns וּשְׁכֶ֣ם <WH7927> thereof Shechem וּבְנֹתֶ֔יהָ <WH1323> also and the towns עַד־ <WH5704> far עַיָּ֖ה <WH5804> thereof unto Gaza וּבְנֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH1323> and the towns

וְעַל־ <WH5921> and along יְדֵ֣י <WH3027> And by the borders בְנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children מְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <WH4519> of Manasseh בֵּית־ שְׁאָ֤ן <WH1052> Bethshean וּבְנֹתֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH1323> and her towns תַּעְנַ֣ךְ <WH8590> Taanach וּבְנֹתֶ֔יהָ <WH1323> and her towns מְגִדּ֥וֹ <WH4023> Megiddo וּבְנוֹתֶ֖יהָ <WH1323> and her towns דּ֣וֹר <WH1756> Dor וּבְנוֹתֶ֑יהָ <WH1323> and her towns בְּאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> these יָשְׁב֔וּ <WH3427> In these dwelt בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> of Joseph בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel פ

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The sons אָשֵׁ֗ר <WH836> of Asher יִמְנָ֧ה <WH3232> Imnah וְיִשְׁוָ֛ה <WH3438> and Ishuai וְיִשְׁוִ֥י <WH3440> and Isuah וּבְרִיעָ֖ה <WH1283> and Beriah וְשֶׂ֥רַח <WH8294> and Serah אֲחוֹתָֽם׃ <WH269> their sister

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the sons בְרִיעָ֔ה <WH1283> of Beriah חֶ֖בֶר <WH2268> Heber וּמַלְכִּיאֵ֑ל <WH4439> and Malchiel ה֖וּא <WH1931> who אֲבִ֥י <WH1> who [is] the father [בִרְזֹות כ] (בִרְזָֽיִת׃ <WH1269> Birzavith from the marg ק)

וְחֶ֙בֶר֙ <WH2268> And Heber הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> יַפְלֵ֔ט <WH3310> Japhlet וְאֶת־ <WH853> שׁוֹמֵ֖ר <WH7763> and Shomer וְאֶת־ <WH853> חוֹתָ֑ם <WH2369> and Hotham וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> שׁוּעָ֥א <WH7774> and Shua אֲחוֹתָֽם׃ <WH269> their sister

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the sons יַפְלֵ֔ט <WH3310> of Japhlet פָּסַ֥ךְ <WH6457> Pasach וּבִמְהָ֖ל <WH1118> and Bimhal וְעַשְׁוָ֑ת <WH6220> and Ashvath אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> These בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> These [are] the children יַפְלֵֽט׃ <WH3310> of Japhlet
